text: Olympics sports are games that are in Olympics in Summer and Winter Olympics. The 2024 Summer Olympics has 32 sports, and the 2022 Winter Olympics has 7 sports. The Olympics 5 rings means 5 continents in the world that have played Olympics. The sports are: Swimming, Golf, Volleyball, Hockey, etc. The most recent Olympics is the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris. Every Olympics will happen about 2 years per each. The next Olympics will be the 2026 Winter Olympics at February 6th 2026. Category:Olympic Games
title: Olympic sports
